page.title: 08CHURCH LIFE
page.content: Anglican(St.Michael's,St.Mary's,Holy Trinity,All Saint's Murston,St.Peter &St.Paul Borden),Methodist,Baptist, United Reformed,Roman Catholic and Salvation Army. CHANGES The Baptist Church is having new Hymn books and moving to new premises in Bell Rd.The Salvation Army is having a building extension.The vicar of Murston is on an American exchange.WEEKLY ACTIVITIES include Scouts,Guides,Brownies,Cubs, Youth clubs,Bible study and prayer groups,Sunday schools and a new Girl's Brigade unit at Holy Trinity.PLANS U.R.C. are to have a church holiday. St.Michael's plans a fellowship meal. St.Mary's and Holy Trinity are sharing a local ordained ministry. SITTINGBOURNE COUNCIL OF CHURCHES includes 13 churches which meet to pray.They run a Christian bookshop,and put on Christian films.
